metadata.synopsis: AD that hexed Mayrina (in sheep form) does when she gets damaged by the voodoo doll.IMPORTANT: These should be just noises so we don't do extra handling for players with PETPAL
metadata.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A- Deal damage to |Voodoo doll| - S_LOW_HagSurvivors_VoodooDoll 5b0a0081-d158-4c19-8796-5628cc03672a - (-40; 19; -140)

0.context: NodeContext: Mayrina is a sheep but she says all kinds of animal noises (sheep, cat, etc). These have to be noises of an animal IN PAIN. Can adjust the spelling depending on what you do!
